channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Showing URL in QR Code
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Showing URL in QR Code

item.title: CVE-2022-3847|2024-08-03T01:20:58.782Z -- unknown -- showing%20url%20in%20qr%20code
item.description: The Showing URL in QR Code WordPress plugin through 0.0.1 does not have CSRF check when updating its settings, and is missing sanitisation as well as escaping, which could allow attackers to make logged in admin or editor add Stored XSS payloads via a CSRF attack
